content.rendered:
Indulge yourself with our Floral Decor! Ideal for those who adore having fresh cut flowers in their house. Each bundle consists of hand-selected, freshly cut seasonal flowers sourced directly from the growers.

Packaged with convenience in mind, they’re ready for you to unleash your creativity, arranging them into separate vases to adorn various areas within your house.

These are CUT BLOOMS ONLY, untouched by our florists. Finished with our signature wrap and trailing ribbon.

Petite includes 2 house varieties.
Standard & Generous includes 3 house varieties.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this, with no two flowers for the house the same! Images are provided for illustrative purposes only. Flower dimensions and colour vary depending on seasons and availability. Please place your trust in us, to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Generous option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
